stages.logText: Among some huts to the west of the Duleian road, I met a man called two-teeth. He wants me to go get him something called Rat poison from Lowyna. I can find her in one of the other huts.
Lowyna will now allow me to trade with her.
I have given some rat poison to two-teeth.
In a cabin just off the Duleian road northwest of the Foaming Flask tavern, I met a man called Lleglaris. He wants me to retrieve an amulet that he has lost.
The amulet can be found in a cave infested with undead to the east of his cabin. He said something about the ground having been corrupted around that cave. I don't know what he meant.
I have given the amulet back to Lleglaris.
As thanks, Lleglaris offered to trade some of his items with me.
